description: Candidates are asked if they believe the States should fund affordable housing construction.
title: Guernsey Election 2020: Affordable housing
title_page: Guernsey Election 2020: Affordable housing - BBC News
maintext: "A suite of additional schemes such as a Deposit Loan Scheme and a Freehold/Leasehold Scheme would greatly widen the reach of the GHA offering and the siting of homes should be in their remit as per the IDP."
